title: Wednesday Post Show (04-27-22)
itunes:title: Wednesday Post Show (04-27-22)
description:
Bobby addresses the beef with Lunchbox and Chris Janson and how it’s cringey. In additional news: Will Smith’s next Netflix project has been cancelled and Megan Fox admits that she and Machine Gun Kelly drink each other’s blood. Bobby shares why he thinks the American Dream has changed. Eddie asks Bobby for advice on how to start a business if you have no idea where to begin. Lunchbox reveals a class he took that we had no idea about.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
